messages.content:
Web VR A-Frame world, random sky and floor color, 1000 random size buildings of color R between 127 and 200, G between 15 and 140, B between 10 and 30, random black or yellow rectangle on sides of buildings as windows. Random string updated once each second. 10 spheres with text labels update once per 10 seconds with color, position, text content info from random string. random string displays in white at top. display updated once each second.
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
